quoteLast: a shower of sparks suddenly announced an explosion, directly after which the _Leipzig_ foundered. Several of our boats were holed, and we only succeeded in saving six officers and nine men between the two of us, all of whom, however, survived the extreme cold.
title: The Battle of the Falkland Islands, Before and After
author: Spencer-Cooper, Henry Edmund Harvey, 1884-1968

quoteFirst: ’ I was glad when it was over, I can assure you. The buttons to my braces were dragged off my back by the pressure behind, and I had to hold up my breeches with my hand. The eclipse lasted from
quoteLast: to 25 minutes past 12, and in that time 247 persons had a peep. The police were there to keep order, but they didn’t interfere with me.
title: London Labour and the London Poor, Vol. 3
author: Mayhew, Henry, 1812-1887
